title: Tony Blair's apology for Iraq: Will history forgive him for decision to go to war?
text: John Rentoul : Invading Iraq was always a defensible act All this has been said before, and it will all be said again. Tony Blair apologised in 2004 for the faulty intelligence on Saddam Hussein ’s weapons of mass destruction. “I can
